<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting">
    <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <code_url/>

        <example_url/>
        <module/>
        <number>SNSCRIPT0001127</number>
        <replaced_by/>
        <script>function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below 
	var ciobj = g_form.getReference('cmdb_ci');
	if(ciobj.sys_class_name == 'cmdb_ci_ip_phone'){
		g_form.setValue('u_phone', true);	
	} else{
		g_form.setValue('u_phone', false);
	}  
}
</script>
        <script_2/>
        <script_type>Client Script</script_type>
        <short_description>A Client Script that sets a Value Based on CI Class</short_description>
        <state>Submitted</state>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
